resources.string: A/B Dictionary with complete Bangla to English translation database. Comes along with a modern UI and much more to explore
I\'m looking at the dictionary for you to translate!
Oops! Did you make a spelling mistake?!
Your translation history will appear here
You haven\'t added any favourite words yet
Philosopher, Learner, Enthusiast. Know more in the Developer Info panel
App icon changes according to the app theme

Copyright Notice:

 The English grammar database used in this app has been collected from various sources. I have made my best efforts to ensure that all content used is in compliance with copyright laws.

 However, I cannot guarantee that the entire database is free from any copyright restrictions.

 If you believe that any portion of the database infringes upon your rights or you are the respectful owner, please contact with me so that I can address the issue promptly.

 [BDictionary]

Disclaimer:

 The Dictionary App provides translations based on a large database created by the app developer. While efforts have been made to ensure accuracy, translations may not be perfect due to language variations and contextual factors. The database aims to minimize errors, but occasional misspellings or false information may occur. Users are responsible for verifying and validating translations. Language evolution means that some newer words or usages may not be included but effort were made at best. The app developer is not liable for any damages or losses resulting from the use of translations. Third-party content is provided for reference, but its accuracy is not guaranteed. By using the app, you agree to these terms.


Note: This disclaimer is subject to change and should be reviewed periodically.

Copyright 2023 - BDictionary


All rights reserved. 


The source code of this app, including its design, architecture, and functionality is released under an open-source license and is free for anyone to use, modify, and distribute. However, the databases included in this app, except for the grammar database, are the sole property of BDictionary. These databases are protected by copyright laws.


The grammar database included in this app has been collected from the internet and does not belong to BDictionary. It is used under fair use, as applicable.


You are granted a non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use and access the source code for personal, educational, and non-commercial purposes. You may modify and distribute the source code in accordance with the terms of the open-source license.


However, you may not modify, distribute, reproduce, sell, or create derivative works based on the databases, except for the grammar database, without the explicit written permission of BDictionary owner. Unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of the databases, in whole or in part, may result in severe civil and criminal penalties under applicable law.


For inquiries regarding the use or licensing of the databases, except for the grammar database, please contact Acp Siam at acpsiam@gmail.com or look at the Developer Info panel.


Any other trademarks, logos, or copyrighted materials used in this app belong to their respective owners and are used under fair use or with permission.
